title: Extra free supports concludes + new free rotation

replies.body: Please keep the extra supports concept. It makes teaching new players and friends much more viable when your not stuck playing the same thing all week with new players. You want new players on the game? Give us a range of fun supports so we can teach them what getting fed is all about!
i second this. I just started and got to play leona because of this. It is a great idea.
This is gonna sound bad, but I'm actually liking blitzcrank.
While it feels a bit desperate, I enjoyed the free supports. I didn't find any new mains though, thresh is enough for me.
